abstract: Lydia Ko takes third-round lead at United States Women's Open, despite shaky start, as she pursues her third major title.

headline.print_headline: Pursuing Third Major, Ko Leads U.S. Open
headline.main: Lydia Ko Leads U.S. Open With Her Eye on a Third Major Title

snippet: Ko, 19, leads the tournament by one shot after her performance in Saturday’s third round, a two-under-par 70....
lead_paragraph: Ko, 19, leads the tournament by one shot after her performance in Saturday’s third round, a two-under-par 70.
